original_text: For the stone shall cry out of the wall, and the beam out of the timber shall answer it.
korean_text: 담에서 돌이 부르짖고 집에서 들보가 응답하리라

sentences.original_text: For the stone shall cry out of the wall
and the beam out of the timber shall answer it
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 들보가 재목에서 그것에 응답할 것임이라
